column2: "Na EWURADZE n’adakaa no dzii abosoom esuon wɔ Filistiafo mba no mu."
"Na Filistiafo no frɛɛ asɔfo na akɔmfo no dɛ
column3: Yɛnyɛ EWURADZE n’adakaa no dɛn? Hom nkyerɛ hɛn dza yɛmfa nka ho nkesi n’ananmu."

column2: "Na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Sɛ hom dze Israel Nyankopɔn n’adakaa no rokɔ a
column4: mma hom mmfa no pan nnkɔ; na mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ nyinara hom mfa asodzi afɔr mma no: na hom ho bɛyɛ hom dzen
column5: na hom bohu adze kor a osian ntsi ma ne nsa mmfi hom do."

column2: "Nna wobisaa dɛ
column3: Ebɛn asodzi afɔr na yɛmfa mma no? Na wɔsee dɛ
column4: Sika a wɔayɛ no dɛ mpɔmpɔ enum
column6: dɛ mbrɛ Filistiafo mpanyimfo no hɔn dodow tse: na mbusu kor no ara na ɔbaa hom na hom mpanyimfo nyinara do."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom nyɛ hom mpɔmpɔ no n’ehonyi
column3: na hom nkura a wɔsɛɛ asaase no n’ehonyi; na hom mfa enyimnyam mma Israel Nyankopɔn; kyerɛ gyangyanbiara obeyi ne nsa efi hom

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi mbom na hom pirim hom akoma dɛ mbrɛ Egyptfo na Farao piriim hɔn akoma yi? Aber a ɔyɛɛ anwanwadze wɔ hɔn mu no
column3: ana woenngya nkorɔfo no kwan

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column3: hom mfa tseaseanam fofor na hom nsiesie
column4: na anantwiber ebien a wɔma enumfo a kɔndua nnkɔr hɔn do da
column5: na hom mfa anantwi no nsa tseaseanam no
column6: na hom mpaa hɔn mba no mfi hɔn ho mbra fie:"

column2: "na hom mfa EWURADZE n’adakaa no nsi tseaseanam no do
column3: na hom mfa sika egudze no a hom dze reyɛ asodzi afɔr ama no no ngu sikadaka mu nsi ne nkyɛn; na wongya no kwan ma ɔnkɔ."

column2: "Na wɔnhwɛ
column3: sɛ ɔfa noara no ntoaado kwan too kɔ Bɛt-semes a
column4: nna ɔnoara na ɔabɔ hɛn mbusu kɛse yi: na sɛ annyɛ dɛm a
column5: nna yebohu dɛ nnyɛ ne nsa bi na okum hɛn
column6: na esian bi na esian hɛn."

column2: "Na mbarimba no yɛɛ dɛm: na wɔfaa anantwiber a wɔma enumfo ebien
column3: na wɔdze hɔn sesee tseaseanam no
column4: na wɔtoow hɔn mba no mu wɔ fie:"

column2: "na wɔdze EWURADZE n’adakaa no sii tseaseanam no do
column3: na wɔdze sikadaka no a sika nkura na hɔn mpɔmpɔ ehonyi wɔ mu no kaa ho."

column2: "Na anantwiber no faa akwantsen kɔr Bɛt-semes kwan no do; wɔfaa tsempɔn no do kɔree
column3: mbrɛ wɔrokɔ no nna worusu
column4: na wɔanndan ammfa enyimfa anaa abankum; na Filistiafo mpanyimfo no dzii hɔn ekyir kodur Bɛt-semes ntoaado."

column2: "Nna Bɛt-semesfo rutwa hɔn ewifua wɔ bɔnsa no mu: na wɔmemaa hɔn enyi do
column3: na wohun adaka no
column4: na ɔyɛɛ hɔn dɛw dɛ wohunii."

column2: "Na tseaseanam no baa Bɛt-semesnyi Josua ne haban mu
column3: na ogyinaa hɔ
column4: beebi mbrɛ ɔbo kɛse bi wɔ: na wɔpaapaa tseaseanam no no dua no mu
column5: na wɔdze anantwiber no bɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr maa EWURADZE."

column2: "Na Levifo no yii EWURADZE n’adakaa no sii famu
column3: na sikadaka no a ɔka ho no a sika egudze no wɔ mu no
column4: na wɔdze sisii ɔbo kɛse no do: na Bɛt-semesfo bobɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr
column5: na wokunkum okum afɔr da no ara maa EWURADZE."

column2: "Na Filistiafo mpanyimfo beenum no hunii no
column3: wɔsanee kɔr Ekron da no ara."

column2: "Na iyinom nye sika mpɔmpɔ a Filistiafo no dze yɛɛ asodzi afɔr dze maa EWURADZE no; Ashdod dze kor
column3: Gaza dze kor

column2: "na sika nkura no
column3: tse dɛ mbrɛ Filistiafo nkurow a ɔyɛ mpanyimfo beenum no dze no no dodow tse
column4: nkurow a wɔatotow ho aban na nkurobaase: mekyerɛ ɔdze kodu ɔbo kɛse no a wɔdze EWURADZE n’adakaa no sii do no ho
column5: ɔbo no wɔ hɔ ara dze bodu ndɛ da yi wɔ Bɛt-semesnyi Josua ne haban mu."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kum Bɛt-semesfo no mu bi
column3: osiandɛ wɔahwɛ EWURADZE n’adakaa no mu
column4: mekyerɛ okum ɔman no mu nyimpa eduosuon
column5: na nyimpa mpemeduonum: na ɔman no dzii awerɛhow
column6: osiandɛ EWURADZE dze oku kɛse eku ɔman no."

column2: "Na Bɛt-semesfo no see dɛ
column3: Woana na obotum egyina EWURADZE
column5: na obefi hɛn nkyɛn akɔ woana hɔ?"

column2: "Na wotuu abɔfo ma wɔkɔr Kiriat-jearimfo hɔ
column3: dɛ
column4: Filistiafo dze EWURADZE n’adakaa no asan bio; hom mbra
column5: na hom mbɛfa mfow nkɔ hom nkyɛn."
